Maybe an ability to cut and reassemble anything in a grid shape. Kinda like Law's ability but only in cubes and I can't really control the objects like Law.

*Alert Alert, we have a fucking Critic in the building, please evacuate the premise, I repeat please evacuate the premise*

!http://hawkshoop.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/siren.gif!

"Mommy whats happening?"

"Nothing dear, just cover your ears and eyes and lets go"

"NOOOOOO LET ME IN THERE!"

"Sir you got to Vacate the Premise!"

"My Daughter's still in there!"

"She'll be fine if she's wearing something ni-"

"SHE'S WEARING CROCKS WITH SOCKS!"

"Oh dear god...." 

"MEN SEND IN A RESCUE CRUE IMMEDIATELY!"
